SEARCH
Package businessLayer

Class OrderManager

java.lang.Object
businessLayer.OrderManager
public class OrderManager extends Object
The OrderManager class is responsible for managing orders in the application. It uses OrderDetailManager to perform all operations related to order details. It communicates with the OrderDao and ClientDao to perform its operations.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    OrderManager()
    Constructs a new OrderManager with a new OrderDao, ClientDao, and OrderDetailManager.
